data.title: courtneycox
data.text:
Courtney Cox, a Boston native, is a Digital Host/Reporter for NESN

Prior to joining the NESN team Cox was a host and production assistant at the ACC Digital Network in Charlotte, NC. She joined the ACCDN in July 2014 after graduating from Boston College with a B.A. in communication. From there she made it back to her home-state of MA and joined LAX Sports Network as an Anchor/Reporter

Cox began her on-air career as a reporter for “Eagle Eye View,” an online segment that provides inside access to Boston College Athletics through interviews with players and coaches. She also served as the in-game live host for Boston College football, basketball, and hockey events.

A dedicated athlete herself, Cox was a member of the Boston College cheerleading program for three years, one year as a captain, traveling to ACC schools around the country to cheer the Eagles on from the sidelines before dedicating her senior year to focus on her reporting career.
